message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a section specifically for "Cash and Cash Equivalents" with a line item labeled "Beginning Balance" which shows the value at the start of the period.

From the cash flow statement:
```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-01-28 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-28 |
```

This is confirmed by the balance sheet, where the sum of "Cash on Hand" and "Bank Deposits" at the initial date is:
```
| Cash on Hand | 3000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | ... |
| Bank Deposits | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | ... |
```
3000000.00 + 5000000.00 = 8000000.00

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
